crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert icmp $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any ( msg:"PROTOCOL-ICMP Unusual PING detected"; icode:0; itype:8; fragbits:!M; content:!"ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWABCDEFGHI",depth 32; content:!"0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuv",depth 32; content:!"EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE",depth 36; content:!"WANG2"; content:!"cacti-monitoring-system",depth 65; content:!"SolarWinds",depth 72; metadata:policy max-detect-ips drop,ruleset community; reference:url,krebsonsecurity.com/2014/01/a-closer-look-at-the-target-malware-part-ii/; reference:url,krebsonsecurity.com/2014/01/a-first-look-at-the-target-intrusion-malware/; classtype:successful-recon-limited; sid:29456; rev:3; )
alert icmp $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"PROTOCOL-ICMP traceroute"; itype:8; ttl:1; metadata:ruleset community; classtype:attempted-recon; sid:385; rev:8; )
alert ( gid:116; sid:424; rev:2; msg:"(eth) truncated ethernet header"; metadata: policy max-detect-ips drop, rule-type decode; classtype:misc-activity;)
alert icmp $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"PROTOCOL-ICMP PING"; icode:0; itype:8; metadata:ruleset community; classtype:misc-activity; sid:384; rev:8; )

alert icmp $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"PROTOCOL-ICMP Destination Unreachable Network Unreachable"; icode:0; itype:3; metadata:ruleset community; classtype:misc-activity; sid:401; rev:9; )

Felix Bilstein - yara-signator at cocacoding dot com

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

crowdsourced_ai_results.analysis: This sample is a Backdoor/RAT. It performs system fingerprinting by collecting the username via GetUserNameExA and the volume serial number via GetVolumeInformationA. It achieves stealth by creating a hidden window ('win32app') with the WS_EX_TOOLWINDOW style. The binary implements persistence through registry modification (RegSetValueExA) and uses a custom RC4-like encryption routine (sub_401926) for C2 communication. Networking capabilities include non-blocking socket operations, WSAIoctl for keep-alive configuration, and encrypted data transmission to a remote server.
